# Government Tender Announcement

## Adobe License Renewal Notice
### Notice ID: WS4659758691-Doc4667984170

## Issuing Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids on the following contract:

### Contract Details:

* Contract Number: 5A427-246422
* Tender Description: Procurement of SAS Subscription Software Licenses
* Tender Closing Date: July 15th, 2024, 14:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: TBA
* Expected Contract End Date: TBA

## Contract Value and Evaluation Criteria

* The contract value is expected to be $ [value]
* The selection criteria is based on Lowest Price

## Eligibility and Trade Agreements

* The bid is open to those who have entered into a trade agreement with the Government of Canada, including but not limited to:
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) 
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

## Bid Submission

* Bids must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery by July 15th, 2024, 14:00 EST
* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on TBD by 14:00 EST

## Contact Information

* Contact Person: Pascal Plouffe, PSPC/SPAC
* Email: [pascal.plouffe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:pascal.plouffe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: ( TBD)

This tender announcement provides opportunities for suppliers to renew their Adobe licenses. If you're interested in participating and have any questions, reach out to [pascal.plouffe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](
